publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-821# Cathy Peattie: National Volunteer Week-That the Parliament notes that National Volunteer Week begins on Thursday 1 June 2000; believes that volunteers are an essential element of social wellbeing, and hopes that the week will encourage wider participation in volunteering.
S1M-821# National Volunteer Week (lodged on 9 May 2000) Shona Robison*
S1M-821# National Volunteer Week (lodged on 9 May 2000) Richard Lochhead*, Margaret Jamieson*

S1M-821# Cathy Peattie: National Volunteer Week-That the Parliament notes that National Volunteer Week begins on Thursday 1 June 2000; believes that volunteers are an essential element of social wellbeing, and hopes that the week will encourage wider participation in volunteering. Supported by: Shona Robison, Richard Lochhead, Margaret Jamieson, Mr Keith Raffan*
S1M-821# National Volunteer Week (lodged on 9 May 2000) Cathy Jamieson*, Elaine Smith*, Karen Gillon*
S1M-821# National Volunteer Week (lodged on 9 May 2000) David McLetchie*, Linda Fabiani*, Marilyn Livingstone*, Robert Brown*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Brian Adam*, Kate Maclean*
S1M-821# National Volunteer Week (lodged on 9 May 2000) Nora Radcliffe*, Mr Duncan Hamilton*
S1M-821# National Volunteer Week (lodged on 9 May 2000) Irene McGugan*

S1M-821# Cathy Peattie: National Volunteer Week—That the Parliament notes that National Volunteer Week begins on Thursday 1 June 2000; believes that volunteers are an essential element of social wellbeing, and hopes that the week will encourage wider participation in volunteering. Supported by: Shona Robison, Richard Lochhead, Margaret Jamieson, Mr Keith Raffan, Cathy Jamieson, Elaine Smith, Karen Gillon, David McLetchie, Linda Fabiani, Marilyn Livingstone, Robert Brown, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Brian Adam, Kate Maclean, Nora Radcliffe, Mr Duncan Hamilton, Irene McGugan

S1M-821# Cathy Peattie: National Volunteer Week—That the Parliament notes that National Volunteer Week begins on Thursday 1 June 2000; believes that volunteers are an essential element of social wellbeing, and hopes that the week will encourage wider participation in volunteering.
